Section.Label: Chapter_YangBaxter_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_YangBaxter_automatic_generated_documentation_of_properties
Section.Heading: YangBaxter automatic generated documentation of properties

ManSection.Returns: true if the cycle set is indecomposable
ManSection.Description: Let X be a cycle set. We say that X is indecomposable if the group \mathcal{G}(X)=\langle\varphi_x:x\in X\rangle acts transitively on X.
